body_html:
There's a suggestion of a workaround for Endianness conversion in #2619. Also some discussion of how to set and handle the IS_LITTLE_ENDIAN flag.
I think we're in the unfortunate situation of not being able to test big-endian code. We're happy to accept patches that add big-endian support.

body:
There's a suggestion of a workaround for Endianness conversion in #2619. Also some discussion of how to set and handle the IS_LITTLE_ENDIAN flag.  
I think we're in the unfortunate situation of not being able to test big-endian code. We're happy to accept patches that add big-endian support.
